resources.name: Get a list of Kafka topics.
Get metadata about a specific topic.
Produce messages to a topic, optionally specifying keys or partitions for the messages.
Get a list of partitions for the topic.
Get metadata about a single partition in the topic.
resources.url: {{ scheme  }}://{{ host  }}/topics/{% prompt 'topic_name', '', '', '', false, true %}/partitions/{% prompt 'partition_id', '', '0', '', false, true %}

resources.name: Get a summary of the offsets in this topic partition.
resources.url: {{ scheme  }}://{{ host  }}/topics/{% prompt 'topic_name', '', '', '', false, true %}/partitions/{% prompt 'partition_id', '', '0', '', false, true %}/offsets

resources.name: Produce messages to one partition of the topic.
resources.url: {{ scheme  }}://{{ host  }}/topics/{% prompt 'topic_name', '', '', '', false, true %}/partitions/{% prompt 'partition_id', '', '0', '', false, true %}

resources.name: Create a new consumer instance in the consumer group.
Commit a list of offsets for the consumer
Get the last committed offsets for the partitions
Subscribe to the given list of topics or a topic pattern to get dynamically assigned partitions.
Get the current subscribed list of topics.
Manually assign a list of partitions to this consumer
Get the list of partitions currently manually assigned to this consumer.
Overrides the fetch offsets that the consumer will use for the next set of records to fetch.
Seek to the first offset for each of the given partitions.
Fetch data for the topics or partitions specified using one of the subscribe/assign APIs.
Get a list of partitions for the topic.
Get metadata about a single partition in the topic.
resources.url: {{ scheme  }}://{{ host  }}/topics/{% prompt 'topic_name', '', '', '', false, true %}/partitions/{% prompt 'partition_id', '', '0', '', false, true %}

resources.name: Consume messages from one partition of the topic
resources.url: {{ scheme  }}://{{ host  }}/topics/{% prompt 'topic_name', '', '', '', false, true %}/partitions/{% prompt 'partition_id', '', '0', '', false, true %}/messages

resources.name: Produce messages to one partition of the topic
resources.url: {{ scheme  }}://{{ host  }}/topics/{% prompt 'topic_name', '', '', '', false, true %}/partitions/{% prompt 'partition_id', '', '0', '', false, true %}

resources.name: Create a new consumer instance in the consumer group.
Commit offsets for the consumer. Returns a list of the partitions with the committed offsets.
Get a broker
resources.url: {{ scheme  }}://{{ host  }}/v3/clusters/{% prompt 'cluster_id', '', '', '', false, true %}/brokers/{% prompt 'broker_id', '', '', '', false, true %}

resources.name: List of topics belonging to a cluster
